text: Trump rally shooting live updates: Shooter was a 20-year-old man from Pennsylvania, officials say  —  Donald Trump's campaign said in a statement that he was “fine” after being whisked off the stage at a rally in Butler, Pennsylvania after apparent gunshots rang through the crowd.

Trump says he was shot at rally in assassination attempt; spectator killed and shooter dead  —  A Trump spokesperson said the former president was “fine.”  —  Republican presidential candidate former President Donald Trump is surrounded by U.S. Secret Service agents at a campaign rally, Saturday, July 13, 2024, in Butler, Pa.

Trump ‘felt the bullet ripping through the skin’ during apparent assassination attempt  —  The former president was injured during a shooting at a rally in western Pennsylvania that killed one and injured two others.  —  Former President Donald Trump survived an apparent assassination attempt …

Here's What Is Known About the Suspected Gunman  —  Authorities identified the gunman as a 20-year-old man from Bethel Park, a town about an hour's drive from the site of the shooting.  —  The gunman who attempted to assassinate former President Donald J. Trump at a rally in Pennsylvania …

Trump rally shooter identified as 20-year-old Pennsylvania man  —  The FBI identified the shooter, who is dead, as Thomas Matthew Crooks of Bethel Park, Pennsylvania.  A motive was not clear.  —  Law enforcement authorities have identified the man who made an assassination attempt …

Witness says he saw gunman on roof near Trump rally  —  A man with a rifle was seen on a rooftop minutes before shots were fired at a Donald Trump rally in Pennsylvania, a witness has told the BBC.  —  Greg Smith said the man had crawled on top of a building just outside the event in Butler County on Friday evening.

Who is Thomas Matthew Crooks, the suspected Trump rally shooter  —  The FBI identified 20-year-old Thomas Matthew Crooks of Bethel Park, Pennsylvania as the suspect in Saturday's attempted assassination of former U.S. President Donald Trump at a campaign rally.

Gunman in Trump Attack Is 20-Year-Old Pennsylvania Man  — FBI identified the alleged shooter as Thomas Matthew Crooks  — He was killed by law enforcement officials after opening fire  —  The Federal Bureau of Investigation has identified the gunman who shot at former President Donald Trump …

Trump allies immediately blame Biden, Democrats for their rhetoric  —  Supporters argued that Democratic portrayals of Trump as a threat to democracy led to the violence, though the shooter's motive was not apparent at the time of their remarks.  —  Top allies of Donald Trump quickly accused President Biden …

Misinformation spreads swiftly in hours after Trump rally shooting  —  Conspiracy theories swell around false flags, Deep State, Biden and the Secret Service, filling the information vacuum as consumers choose their own reality.  —  Law enforcement officials quickly launched an investigation …

Dems mute Trump criticism  —  Joe Biden, Nancy Pelosi, Barack Obama, Hakeem Jeffries and Chuck Schumer have all put out statements condemning the violence.  —  Nancy Pelosi spent the week warning of the dangers of her archrival former President Donald Trump.  The shooting at his rally on Saturday completely changed the discussion.

Statement from President Joe Biden  —  I have been briefed on the shooting at Donald Trump's rally in Pennsylvania.  —  I'm grateful to hear that he's safe and doing well.  I'm praying for him and his family and for all those who were at the rally, as we await further information.

House launches “full investigation” into Trump rally shooting … - “US Secret Service quickly responded with protective measures and the former president is safe and being evaluated,” the agency said in a statement shortly after the shooting. … - “I have already contacted the Secret Service …

The Assassination Attempt on Donald Trump in Eleven Pictures  —  HISTORY CAPTURED  —  In just seconds, the bullets fired by a would-be assassin came close to killing Trump and left one person dead and two critically wounded.  —  The assassination attempt against former President Donald Trump unfolded …
